ariaLabel.name: ariaLabel
ariaLabel.description: Define a string that labels the current element (Slider)

ariaLabelledby.name: ariaLabelledby
ariaLabelledby.description: ElementId of Node that have the text needed for labeling the current element (Slider)

className.name: className
className.description: Custom `class name` to be added to the component-root-node

color.name: color
color.description: Color Mode (primary/positive/negative) of the component (Slider)

data-testid.name: data-testid
data-testid.description: Unique TestId - can be used as Selector for integration tests and other needs (tracking, etc)

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description:
If set to true, Component (Slider) will be disabled
 - impossible to change value of component (Slider)
 - visual changes (opacity)

id.name: id
id.description: Attribute `id` to be added to the component-root-node

max.name: max
max.description: Max range value of the component (Slider)

min.name: min
min.description: Min range value of the component (Slider)

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.description:
Optional onChange callback (for outer trigger or Controlled mode)
- required in Controlled Mode

ranged.name: ranged
ranged.description: If true switch slider to RRange mode (two Thumbs)

step.name: step
step.description:
The granularity with which the slider can step through values.
(A "discrete" slider.) The min prop serves as the origin for the valid values.
We recommend (max - min) to be evenly divisible by the step.

size.name: size
size.description: Size small/medium/large of the component (Slider)

value.name: value
value.description:
Current/selected value of the range of the Component (Slider)
  - should be used in Controlled Mode only
  - in ranged mode should be an array of two numbers

valueFormatter.name: valueFormatter
valueFormatter.description:
Default `value` if value not specified
 - should be used in NON-Controlled mode to set initial Value
 - in ranged mode should be an array of two numbers

valueText.name: valueText
valueText.description:
Text/presentation of current/selected value
 - should be used in Controlled Mode only

indicateSelection.name: indicateSelection
indicateSelection.description: Show selected from Slider range value

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description:
Options for initial/start/prefix element, it can be one of:
 - Any Component (react component, node, text, number etc.)
 - Or it can be an object of options for Icons component (see Icon components props)
 - Or it can be an object for Label (Icon, Title - and other components)
 - Or it can be Render Props Function witch are getting value and valueText

postfix.name: postfix
postfix.description: Options for postfix/end/finishing element. Same as prefix element.

 - Or it can be an object of options for Icons component (see Icon components props)
 - Or it can be an object for Label (Icon, Title - and other components)
 - Or it can be Render Props Function witch are getting value and valueText

postfix.name: postfix
postfix.description: Options for postfix/end/finishing element. Same as prefix element.

ariaLabel.name: ariaLabel
ariaLabel.description: Define a string that labels the current element (Slider)

ariaLabelledby.name: ariaLabelledby
ariaLabelledby.description: ElementId of Node that have the text needed for labeling the current element (Slider)

className.name: className
className.description: Custom `class name` to be added to the component-root-node

color.name: color
color.description: Color Mode (primary/positive/negative) of the component (Slider)

data-testid.name: data-testid
data-testid.description: Unique TestId - can be used as Selector for integration tests and other needs (tracking, etc)

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description:
If set to true, Component (Slider) will be disabled
 - impossible to change value of component (Slider)
 - visual changes (opacity)

id.name: id
id.description: Attribute `id` to be added to the component-root-node

max.name: max
max.description: Max range value of the component (Slider)

min.name: min
min.description: Min range value of the component (Slider)

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.description:
Optional onChange callback (for outer trigger or Controlled mode)
- required in Controlled Mode

ranged.name: ranged
ranged.description: If true switch slider to RRange mode (two Thumbs)

step.name: step
step.description:
The granularity with which the slider can step through values.
(A "discrete" slider.) The min prop serves as the origin for the valid values.
We recommend (max - min) to be evenly divisible by the step.

size.name: size
size.description: Size small/medium/large of the component (Slider)

value.name: value
value.description:
Current/selected value of the range of the Component (Slider)
  - should be used in Controlled Mode only
  - in ranged mode should be an array of two numbers

valueFormatter.name: valueFormatter
valueFormatter.description:
Default `value` if value not specified
 - should be used in NON-Controlled mode to set initial Value
 - in ranged mode should be an array of two numbers

valueText.name: valueText
valueText.description:
Text/presentation of current/selected value
 - should be used in Controlled Mode only

indicateSelection.name: indicateSelection
indicateSelection.description: Show selected from Slider range value

icon.name: icon
icon.description: Possible to override the dafult icon

hideIcon.name: hideIcon
hideIcon.description: If true, won't show the icon

closeable.name: closeable
closeable.description: If false, won't show the close button

autoHideDuration.name: autoHideDuration
autoHideDuration.description:
The number of milliseconds to wait before
automatically closing the Toast
(0 or null cancels this behaviour)

className.name: className
className.description: class name to add to the component wrapper

id.name: id
id.description: id to add to the component wrapper

items.name: items
items.description: A list of items to be rendered

getRowHeight.name: getRowHeight
getRowHeight.description:
in order to calculate the number of rows to render in the grid, the component needs the height of the row
return `number`

getColumnWidth.name: getColumnWidth
getColumnWidth.description:
in order to calculate the number of columns to render in the grid, the component needs the width of the column
return `number`

getItemId.name: getItemId
getItemId.description:
returns Id of an items
returns `string`

scrollToId.name: scrollToId
scrollToId.description: index of the item to scroll to

onScrollToFinished.name: onScrollToFinished
onScrollToFinished.description: callback to be called when the scroll is finished

onItemsRendered.name: onItemsRendered
onItemsRendered.description:
a callback that is being called when the items are rendered

   `onItemsRendered => {`

    firstItemId: string

    secondItemId: string

    lastItemId: string

    centerItemId: string

    firstItemOffsetEnd: number

    currentOffsetTop: number

}

onSizeUpdate.name: onSizeUpdate
onSizeUpdate.description: when the grid size changes - `=> (width, height)`
